holidays.title: National Telephone Day
holidays.description: Can you imagine a world without telephones? We'd still be sending messages through pigeons!

holidays.title: World Malaria Day
holidays.description: Mosquitos are an annoying pest in many countries, but in others, a bite can be deadly.

holidays.title: Anzac Day
holidays.description: Anzac Day's one of Australia and New Zealand's most important and revered national occasions.

holidays.title: Bob Wills Day
holidays.description: Celebrating The King Of Western Swing, Bob Wills, right here with us at National Today.

holidays.title: East Meets West Day
holidays.description: Read more to learn about the major events of the Second World War.

holidays.title: Eeyore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Friends of the Forest never forget to make animals feel special on this day.

holidays.title: Freedom Day (Portugal)
holidays.description: This Freedom Day, celebrate the bloodless revolution that ended the tyranny of dictator Marcello Caetano.

holidays.title: Hairstylist Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Do hairstylists just cut hair? Of course not. They are artists, perfectionists, and great conversationalists!

holidays.title: Independent Bookstore Day
holidays.description: Join us as we turn the page and learn why books matter so much.

holidays.title: International Delegate’s Day
holidays.description: Let's get to know our U.N. representatives and what they do at the United Nations.

holidays.title: International Financial Independence Awareness Day
holidays.description: Make a plan today and save 4% of your income to have seamless retirement days.

holidays.title: International Marconi Day
holidays.description: Today, we acknowledge the inventor of wireless communication and seamless radio transmission.

holidays.title: International Noise Awareness Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate International Noise Awareness Day to spread awareness about noise pollution.

holidays.title: International Sculpture Day
holidays.description: Get your hammer and chisel ready, it’s International Sculpture Day! Celebrate right here with us!

holidays.title: License Plate Day
holidays.description: There were 15,000 vehicles in the U.S. when the first license plate was introduced.

holidays.title: National Day of Puppetry
holidays.description: Celebrate the fascinating theatrics of puppets on this day and make one for yourself!

holidays.title: National DNA Day
holidays.description: Learn more about the science that makes us genetically unique.

holidays.title: National Go Birding Day
holidays.description: It’s time to break out the binoculars and observe the activities of our feathered friends.

holidays.title: National Kiss of Hope Day
holidays.description: Learn how to embody hope and work with your partner to support your household.

holidays.title: National Liberation Day
holidays.description: Dance to the tunes of the Italian anti-fascist anthem ‘Bella Ciao’ on National Liberation Day.

holidays.title: National Lingerie Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate the best in lingerie with our great information!

holidays.title: National Mani-Pedi Day
holidays.description: Today’s the day to find out more about why we should treasure our nails!

holidays.title: National Plumbers Day
holidays.description: National Plumbers Day is specially set aside every year to celebrate plumbers.

holidays.title: National Pool Opening Day
holidays.description: See how pool owners across the country take care of their pools in preparation for summer.

holidays.title: National Rebuilding Day
holidays.description: Roll up your sleeves and grab your tools, it’s time to get building.

holidays.title: National Sense of Smell Day
holidays.description: Don’t turn your nose up at this day dedicated to preserving your sense of smell.

holidays.title: National Zucchini Bread Day
holidays.description: Grab a slice of zucchini bread and take advantage of the feasting opportunity this day presents.

holidays.title: Parental Alienation Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us to learn about the consequences and effects of parental alienation.

holidays.title: Red Hat Society Day
holidays.description: Red Hat Society Day is a celebration of women’s friendships, challenges, and enjoying life in style.

holidays.title: Save the Frogs Day
holidays.description: Today is dedicated to our hoppy, jumpy friends who are an important part of our environment.

holidays.title: Sinai Liberation Day
holidays.description: Remember Sinai from the Bible? Read on to know more about this Peninsula.

holidays.title: The Feast of St Mark (Italy)
holidays.description: Let’s honor the patron saint and remember his teachings on the Feast of St. Mark.

holidays.title: World Healing Day
holidays.description: We've got the best ways to spend this day with the most rejuvenating activities.

holidays.title: World Penguin Day
holidays.description: Learn more about this endangered bird that plays an important role in the ecosystem.

holidays.title: World Veterinary Day
holidays.description: Today, we are celebrating veterinarians and the bonds between people and animals!

holidays.title: Al Pacino’s Birthday
holidays.description: From playing an honest cop to a mafia boss — Pacino is one of the greatest actors.

holidays.title: Jay Park’s Birthday
holidays.description: Find out about this multi-talented singer/songwriter’s history in television and the Korean music industry.
